entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening then to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
